entry.title: Electrical Cable Installation-Ballyhay,Charleville
entry.SMS: L-1324-0 Ballyhay, Charleville closed from 00:01hrs Monday 6th February to 24:00hrs Monday 6th March 2017 (24hrs Daily) due to electrical ca
entry.description:
CORK COUNTY COUNCIL
ROADS ACT 1993
TEMPORARY CLOSING OF PUBLIC ROADS






NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN under Section 75 of the Roads Act 1993 that the following roads will be closed to public traffic for the dates and times stated:



Electric Cable Installation – Ballyhay, Charleville
From 00:01hrs Monday 6th February 2017
To 24:00hrs Monday 6th March 2017
(24 Hours Daily)






Road to be Closed:

The L-1324-0 from its junction with the L-1307-39 and L-5488-0 at Ardnageehy to its junction with the N20 at Ballyhay.



Road Number:

L-1324-0.



Alternative Route:

From Ballyhay Cross Roads to Ardnageehy Cross Roads via L-5531-0 west to junction with N20. At junction turn right onto N20 and continue north to Cooleen. At junction turn left onto L-1312-0 and at next junction turn left onto L-1313-28. Follow L-1313-28 to Clashganniv. At junction turn left onto L-5488-0 and continue south to Ardnageehy Cross Roads.

From Ardnageehy Cross roads to Ballyhay Cross Roads via L-1307-39. At junction turn left onto L-5529-16. Follow L-5529-16 to Aglish Cross Roads. At Aglish Cross Roads turn left onto L-5530-0. At Chapel Cross Roads turn left onto N20 and continue north to Ballyhay. At junction turn right onto L-5531-0 to Ballyhay Cross Roads.



This closure is to facilitate the installation of an electric cable.





Director of Roads

Cork County Council

The Courthouse

Skibbereen

Co Cork

entry.title: Electric Cable Installation-Rathnacally,Charlevill
entry.SMS: Part of L-5488-0 Rathnacally/Clashganniv,Charleville closed from Mon.23rd January to Sun.19th February 2017(8am to 7pm daily) due to electri
entry.description:
CORK COUNTY COUNCIL
ROADS ACT 1993
TEMPORARY CLOSING OF PUBLIC ROADS






NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN under Section 75 of the Roads Act 1993 that the following roads will be closed to public traffic for the dates and times stated:





Electric Cable Installation – Rathnacally/Clashganniv, Charleville
From Monday 23rd January 2017
To Sunday 19th February 2017
(8:00am to 7:00pm Daily)






Road to be Closed:

The L-5488-0 from Charleville Sub-Station to its junction with the L-1324-0 and L-1307-39 at Ardnageehy.



Road Number:

L-5488-0 (Part).



Alternative Route:

From Ballypierce to Ardnageehy via L-1313-0 west to Milltown Cross Roads. At cross roads turn left onto L-5481-0. At junction at Cooliney turn left onto L-1307-30 and continue straight ahead to join L-1307-39. Continue north east to Ardnageehy.

From Ardnageehy to Ballypierce via L-1324-0 east to N20 at Ballyhay. At junction turn left onto N20 and continue north to Cooleen. At junction turn left onto L-1312-0. At cross roads at Rathgoggan South turn left onto L-1313-28 and continue south west to Ballypierce.



NOTICE IS FURTHER GIVEN that this proposed closure is to facilitate

the installation of an electric cable.



This closure is to facilitate the installation of an electric cable.



Director of Roads

Cork County Council

The Courthouse

Skibbereen

Co Cork

entry.title: Watermain Works – L2003 Kilmurry

entry.description:
CORK COUNTY COUNCIL



ROADS ACT 1993



TEMPORARY CLOSING OF PUBLIC ROADS







NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN under Section 75 of the Roads Act 1993 that the following roads will be closed to public traffic for the dates and times stated:



Watermain Works – L2003 Kilmurry

From Monday 30th January to Friday 24th February 2017

(24 Hours Daily)

Part of the L2003-0 from its junction with the L-2001-10 and the L-2001-43 in Kilmurry to Kilmurry GAA pitch.  



Road Number:

L2003-0 (Part)



Alternative Route:

Traffic travelling to Kilmurry via the L2004-0 will be diverted right onto the L-6010-0 at Curraclogh Cross Roads and continue onto the L-6011-0 at Currabeha Cross Roads before turning left onto the L2001-43 Cloghmacow Road and continue on towards Kilmurry Village.   



This alternative route is also applicable in the reverse.



This closure is to facilitate Watermain works.

entry.title: Embankment Repair Works – Dunmore Road, Clonakilty
entry.SMS: Road Closure - Part of the L-4010 Dunmore Road, Clonakilty from Monday 30th January to Wednesday 8th March 2017 to facilitate Embankment S
entry.description:
CORK COUNTY COUNCIL



ROADS ACT 1993



TEMPORARY CLOSING OF PUBLIC ROADS







NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN under Section 75 of the Roads Act 1993 that the following roads will be closed to public traffic for the dates and times stated:



Embankment Repair Works – Dunmore Road, Clonakilty

From 06:00hrs Monday 30th January 2017

To 20:00hrs Wednesday 8th March 2017

(24 Hours Daily)



 Roads to be Closed:

The L-4010-61 from its junction with the L-4011-19/L-8043-25/L-4011-41 at Causeway Cross Roads to its junction with the L-8042-0 at Dunmore.

The L-4010-41 from its junction with the L-8042-0 at Dunmore to a point 800m east of said junction.

Road Numbers:

L-4010-61 and L-4010-41 (Part).



Alternative Route:

From Causeway Cross Roads to Dunmore/Muckruss Head via L-4011-19 south/south west to Caher. At Cross Roads turn left onto L-8040-0. At Cross Roads at Mountain Common turn left onto L-4010-0. Continue north east to junction at Duneen. At junction turn right onto L-4010-22 and continue straight ahead to join L-4010-41 to Dunmore/Muckruss Head.



This alternative route is also applicable in the reverse when travelling from Muckruss Head/Dunmore to Causeway Cross Roads.



This closure is to facilitate Embankment Stabilisation Works.



Director of Roads

Cork County Council

The Courthouse

Skibbereen

Co Cork

entry.title: Urgent Closure R613 Fivemilebridge to Ballygarvan
entry.SMS: Urgent Road Closure on Part of the R613 Fivemilebridge to Ballygarvan on Wednesday 18th January to facilitate an Urgent Watermain Break Repa
entry.description:
TEMPORARY CLOSING OF PUBLIC ROADS - URGENT CLOSURE

R613 between Fivemilebridge and Ballygarvan.

I refer to the above and wish to advise you of the following Urgent Road Closure (in accordance of Section 75 of the Roads Act 1993 and Part 8 of the 1994 Road Regulations, Article 12 sub-article 6).

Roads to be closed

R613

Alternative Route

Road Users are to use an alternative route along the Kinsale Road R600 and diversion signs will be in place.

Duration of Works

18th January 2017 for 1 day

Times of Closure

12 Hour Closure from 7am to 7pm.

Reason for Urgent Road Closure

Urgent Watermain Break Repair

You should note that this Urgent Closure does not facilitate the making of objections/observations.

However, if you have any query in relation to same, please contact Irish Water 1890 278 278

entry.title: Site Investigation Works Blackrock Bridge N20
entry.SMS: Site Investigation Works Blackrock Bridge N20. Traffic Management will include the provision of Traffic lights on a count down. 0930hrs-1630
entry.description:
Site Investigation Works to be undertaken by Priority Geotechnical Ltd today, works should be completed in one day.

Works involve the excavation of slit trenches.

Traffic Management will include the provision of Traffic lights on a count down with a shuttle set up from approx 9.30am to 4:30pm

entry.title: Drainage Works N72 Oliver`s Cross to Monanimy

entry.description: Drainage Works being undertaken by Mallow Area Office N72 Oliver`s Cross, Mallow to Monanimy Cross. Stop/Go TM setup. to be in operation during work times. Works Duration 16-27/01/17

Works: 
Site Investigation Works at Ballynamona Relief Bridge  on the N73 between Mallow and Kildorrerry
Duration of Works:
0930hrs-1630hrs Tuesday the 10/01/17

Richmond,
Glanmire,
Co Cork.

entry.title: Archaeological Investigation Works - Youghal
entry.SMS: Part of R634 North Main Street,Youghal closed from 08:00hrs Mon 16th January to 18:00hrs Fri 3rd February 2017(24 hrs daily) due to archaeol
entry.description:
CORK COUNTY COUNCIL
ROADS ACT 1993
TEMPORARY CLOSING OF PUBLIC ROADS






NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN under Section 75 of the Roads Act 1993 that the following roads will be closed to public traffic for the dates and times stated:





Archaeological Investigation Works – R634 North Main Street, Youghal
From 08.00hrs Monday 16th January to 18.00hrs Friday 3rd February 2017
(24 hour Closure)


 

Road To Be Closed:

Part of the R634 North Main Street, Youghal from its junction with the L-3810-0 at Cork Hill to its junction with the L-9516-1 at Fairfield Car Park.



Road Number:

R634 (Part)



Alternative Routes:



Traffic from Tallow Street

Traffic wishing to access Youghal Town will be diverted onto the Breton Road from the roundabout at the junction of Quarry Road/Breton Road. Traffic that enters Youghal Town via Tallow Street will be diverted onto Cork Hill (L3810-0), Dermot Hurley Estate (L-9512-0), Barrack Road (L-3822) & Windmill Lane (L-3823-0) to rejoin the R634.



Traffic from Cork Hill

Traffic will be diverted north onto Tallow Street before being diverted onto Breton Road (R634) at the roundabout junction of Quarry Road and the diversion will end at Dolphin’s Square.



Traffic from North Main Street

Traffic will be diverted onto Dolphin’s Square, east along the R634 and west towards Tallow Street where access to Cork Hill can be availed of.



This closure is to facilitate Archaeological Investigation Works.



Director of Roads

Cork County Council

The Courthouse

Skibbereen

Co Cork

entry.title: Ballygurteen Road Trotting Races

entry.title: Bridge Repair Works - Rooves Bridge, Coachford
entry.SMS: R619 Rooves Bridge closed from Monday 9th to Friday 20th January 2017 (extension to existing closure) 8:00pm to 8:00am daily to facilitate b
entry.description:
ROADS ACT, 1993

TEMPORARY CLOSING OF PUBLIC ROAD – Bridge Replacement works - R619 Rooves Bridge, Coachford

Road to be Closed:

The R619, Rooves Bridge, from its junction with the R618 at Coachford to its junction with the L-2202-0 at Rooves More.

Road Number:

R619 (Part).

Alternative Route:

From Coachford to Rooves More via R618 through Carrigadrohid and west to New Bridge. After bridge turn left onto N22 and travel south to Tooms East. Continue along N22 east to Ballytrasna. At junction turn left onto L-2201-0 and continue north east to Larchill Cross Roads. At Larchill Cross Roads continue straight ahead to join L-2201-30. At the next cross roads continue straight ahead to join L-2201-43. Continue along L-2201-43 to the junction with R619 at Rathonoane. At junction turn left onto R619 and continue east to Rooves More.

This alternative route is also applicable in the reverse when travelling from Rooves More to Coachford.

Duration of closure:

From Monday 9th January 2017 to Friday 20th January 2017 (night time closure 20.00hrs to 08.00hrs)

Reason for urgent closure:

Bridge Replacement Works

You should note that this Urgent Closure does not facilitate the making of objections/observations.

Any queries in relation to same, please contact Blarney Area Office, Units  4-6, Shopping Centre, Tower, Blarney – (021) 4381227.

Director of Roads,

Cork County Council,

Courthouse,

Skibbereen,

Co Cork.

entry.title: Watermain Works – L4715 Scart Road, Bantry
entry.SMS: Road Closure - The L4715 Scart Road, Bantry from Monday 9th January to Friday 27th January 2017 to facilitate Watermain Works.
entry.description:
CORK COUNTY COUNCIL



ROADS ACT 1993



TEMPORARY CLOSING OF PUBLIC ROADS







NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN under Section 75 of the Roads Act 1993 that the following roads will be closed to public traffic for the dates and times stated:



Watermain Works – L4715 Scart Road, Bantry

From Monday 9th January to Friday 27th January 2017

(24 Hours Daily)



Road To Be Closed:

Part of the L-4715-0 Scart Road from its junction with the L-4714-0 at St Finbarr’s Terrace/Hospital Road to its junction with the L-4730-0 at Blackrock Road.



Road Number:

L-4715-0 (Part)



Alternative Route:

Traffic travelling north along Scart Road will turn right onto the L-4714-0 at St Finbarr’s Terrace and continue onto the L-4716-0 Hospital Road. Traffic will then turn left onto the L-4752-0 and continue onto L4753-0 down Chapel Street and turning left onto the L-4715-0 to join the L-4730-0 at Blackrock Road.



Traffic will also be diverted along the L-4730-0 Blackrock Road, turning left onto the L-4729-0 at Tom’s Lane and joining the N71 at the Quay.



This closure is to facilitate Watermain Works.



Director of Roads

Cork County Council

The Courthouse

Skibbereen

Co Cork

CORK COUNTY COUNCIL



ROADS ACT 1993

NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN under Section 75 of the Roads Act 1993 that the following roads will be closed to public traffic for the dates and times stated:

(24 Hours Daily)

 

Road To Be Closed:

The L-4745-0 Old Barrack Road from its junction with the N71 at the Glengarriff Road to its junction with the L-4737-0 and L-4738-0 at the entrance to Reenrour East housing estate.      



Road Number:

L-4745-0



Alternative Route:

Traffic travelling north will be diverted along the N71 on the Glengarriff Road before turning left onto the L-4737-0 at Newtown. From here traffic will follow the L-4737-0 to meet the L-4738-0 at the entrance to Reenrour East housing estate.

entry.title: Urgent Closure L2001 Clomacow Road, Kilmurry
entry.SMS: Road Closure - The L2001 Clomacow Road, Kilmurry from Mon 19th to Fri 23rd December 2016 and Tue 3rd to Fri 20th January 2017 for laying of
entry.description:
ROADS ACT, 1993

TEMPORARY CLOSING OF PUBLIC ROAD – Laying of new watermain – L2001 Clomacow Road, Kilmurry

Road Closed:

The L2001-43 from its junction with the L-2001-10 and the L-2003-0 at Kilmurry to its junction with the L-2001-71 and the L-6011-0 at Clodah.  

Road Number:

L2001-43

Alternative Routes:

Traffic travelling from Kilmurry to Crookstown will follow the L-2002-0 North through Kilmurry Village and turn right onto the N22 at Lissarda. Traffic will follow the N22 before turning right onto the R590 at Stage Cross Roads and onto Crookstown Village.

Traffic travelling from Kilmurry to Crookstown may also follow the L-2003-0 south as far as Barrack Cross Roads, turning right onto the L-2004-0 and continue south before joining the R585 at Bengour East. Traffic will turn left and follow the R585 to Crookstown Village via Bealnablath

Traffic travelling from Crookstown to Kilmurry via the L2001-71 will be diverted left onto the L-6011-0 at Clodah and continue along before turning right onto the L-2003-0 at Currabeha Cross Roads and continue north towards Kilmurry Village via Barrack Cross Roads.    

These alternative routes above are also applicable in the reverse.

Duration of closure:

From Monday 19th December to Friday 23rd December 2016 and Tuesday 3rd January to Friday 20th January 2017  (24 Hours Daily)



Reason for urgent closure:

Laying of a new watermain

You should note that this Urgent Closure does not facilitate the making of objections/observations.

Any queries in relation to same, please contact Macroom Area Office, Town Hall, Macroom – (026) 41047.

Director of Roads,

Cork County Council,

Courthouse,

Skibbereen,

Co Cork.

entry.title: Urgent Closure Ballinspittle Post Office Bridge
entry.SMS: Road Closure - Part of the L7315 at Ballinspittle from Friday 16th December 2016 to Friday 3rd February 2017 to facilitate bridge replacemen
entry.description:
ROADS ACT, 1993

TEMPORARY CLOSING OF PUBLIC ROAD – Bridge Replacement Works – L-7315 Ballinspittle Post Office Bridge



Pursuant to Section 75 of the Roads Act, 1993, & Part 8 of Road Regulations 1994, Article 12 (sub article 6),  notice is hereby given that the urgent closure of the road as detailed below is necessary, in the interests of public safety.



Road Closed:

Part of the L-7315-0 from its junction with the R600 to its junction with the L-7314-0 Ballincurrig Road in Ballinspittle Village.



Road Number:

L-7315-0 (Part).



Alternative Route:

From Ballinspittle Village traffic will be diverted north along the R600, turning left onto the R604 at Coolyrahilly (near Barrel Cross Roads). Traffic will follow the R604 southbound turning right onto the L-7316 at Oldcourt Cross Roads. From here traffic will proceed west through  Ballinvredig Cross Roads rejoining the L-7315-0 at Carrigavulleen.



The alternative route above is also applicable in the reverse.



Traffic on the L-7314-0 may also travel southbound to join the R604 at Garrylucas. Turning right at this junction and following the R604 will bring you to the western side of Ballinspittle Village.



Duration of closure:

From 08.00hrs Friday 16th December 2016 to 20.00hrs Friday 3rd February 2017 (24 Hours Daily)



Reason for closure:

Bridge Replacement Works



You should note that this Urgent Closure does not facilitate the making of objections/observations.



Any queries in relation to same, please contact Kinsale Area Office, New Road, Kinsale – (021) 4772137.



Director of Roads,

Cork County Council,

Courthouse,

Skibbereen,

Co Cork.

entry.title: L4705 Durrus Road Trotting Races 2017
entry.SMS: Road Closure - The L4705 east of durrus on Sunday 1st January 2017 from 12noon to 5pm to facilitate road trotting races
entry.description:
CORK COUNTY COUNCIL



ROADS ACT 1993



TEMPORARY CLOSING OF PUBLIC ROADS





NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN under Section 75 of the Roads Act 1993 that the following roads will be closed to public traffic for the dates and times stated:



Road Trotting Races – Durrus Village to Parkanna Bridge

Sunday 1st January 2017

(12:00pm to 5:00pm)  



 Roads to be Closed:

The L-4705-0 from its junction with the R591 at Durrus Village to its junction with the L-47052-0 at Ballycommane.

The L-4705-25 from its junction with the L-47052-0 at Ballycommane to its junction with the L-47054-0 at Ballycommane.

The L-4705-47 from its junction with the L-47054-0 at Ballycommane to its junction with the N71 at Parkanna Bridge, Letterlicky West.

Road Numbers:

L-4705-0, L-4705-25 and L-4705-47.



Alternative Route:

From Durrus Village to Parkanna Bridge/Letterlicky West via the R591 north east to meet the N71 at Dromacoosane. Turn right onto the N71 and continue south east to Parkanna Bridge/Letterlicky West.



This alternative route is also applicable in the reverse when travelling from Parkanna Bridge/Letterlicky West to Durrus Village.



This closure is to facilitate Road Trotting Races.



Director of Roads

Cork County Council

The Courthouse

Skibbereen

Co Cork

entry.title: R586 Drimoleague Road Trotting Races 2016
entry.SMS: Road Closure - Part of the R586 east of Drimoleague on Monday 26th December 2016 from 12noon to 5pm to facilitate road trotting races
entry.description:
CORK COUNTY COUNCIL



ROADS ACT 1993



TEMPORARY CLOSING OF PUBLIC ROADS







NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN under Section 75 of the Roads Act 1993 that the following roads will be closed to public traffic for the dates and times stated:



Road Trotting Races – R586 Drimoleague to Derrynagree East

Monday 26th December 2016

(12:00pm to 5:00pm)  



Road Closed:

The R586 from its junction with the L-8745-0 at Drimoleague Village to its junction with the L-4234-0 at Derrynagree East.

Road Number:

R586 (Part).



Alternative Route:

From Bantry to Dunmanway via the R586. At Drimoleague Village turn right onto the R593. Continue along R593 to Bawnnahow Cross Roads, Derreeny. At Bawnnahow Cross Roads turn left onto L-4231-0. Continue straight through Bredagh Cross Roads to join L-4231-30. Continue straight through cross roads at Driminidy Wood to join L-4231-51. Continue straight ahead at Minanes Bridge to join the L-4231-71. At Minanes Cross Roads turn left onto L-4234-24. Continue straight ahead to join L-4234-0 at Killaveenoge West. Continue north west along L-4234-0 to join the R586 at Derrynagree East. At Derrynagree East turn right onto R586 and continue north east to Dunmanway.



This alternative route is also applicable in the reverse when travelling from Dunmanway to Bantry.



This closure is to facilitate Road Trotting Races



Director of Roads

Cork County Council

The Courthouse

Skibbereen

Co Cork

entry.title: L1319 Lisgriffin Village
entry.SMS: From Monday 12th of December to Friday 16th of December, From 9.30am to 6.30pm L1319 Lisgriffin Village shall be closed for resurfacing wor
entry.description:
From Monday 12th of December to Friday 16th of December, From 9.30am to 6.30pm each day the L1319 Lisgriffin Village shall be closed to facilitate road resurfacing works. Detour in Place.

Traffic Travelling from Mallow to Liscarroll detour via the N20 & R522 and vice versa for traffic travelling from Liscaroll to Mallow

entry.title: Urgent Rd Closure Extension- Cackinode Br.,Macroom
entry.SMS: L-7447-40 &L-7447-61 closed from 08:00hrs Friday 9th to 20:00hrs Friday 16th December 2016 (24 hrs daily) - Extension to closure for bridge
entry.description:
ROADS ACT, 1993
TEMPORARY CL OSING OF PUBLIC ROAD – Bridge Replacement Works - L7447 Cackinode Bridge, Macroom




Pursuant to Section 75 of the Roads Act, 1993, & Part 8 of Road Regulations 1994, Article 12 (sub article 6),  notice is hereby given that the urgent closure of the road as detailed below is necessary, in the interests of public safety.



Road Closed:
The L-7447-61 and the L-7447-40 from its junction with the L-3417-0, L-3417-18 and the L-7460-0 at Dromree Cross Roads to its junction with the L-7444-39, L-7444-64 and the L-7447-25 at Cappeen Cross Roads.  
 
Road Number:
L-7447-40 & L-7447-61



Alternative Route:
At Cappeen Cross Roads traffic will be diverted along the L-7444-64, turning left to join the R582 at Caherbirrane Cross Roads. Traffic will follow the R582 south and turn left onto the L-3417-0 at Ardnacrushy (Mount Cross) and continue along the L-3417-0 as far as Dromree Cross Roads.



The alternative route above is also applicable in the reverse.



Duration of closure:
From 08.00hrs Friday 9th December 2016 to 20.00hrs Friday 16th December 2016 (24 Hours Daily)



Reason for closure:

Bridge Replacement Works



You should note that this Urgent Closure does not facilitate the making of objections/observations.



Any queries in relation to same, please contact Macroom Area Office, Town Hall, Macroom, Co.Cork – (026) 41047.
